overview: Polina (17) lives in Geneva with her Russian mother and brother Choko (18). They don’t have clear aspirations or dreams. Polina goes to Russia and finds herself thousands of miles away, in the Taiga. She meets Monke (18) who lives in the forest with several families in an ancient Scythian tumulus. They have mutations due to an environmental disaster. Polina and Monke fall for each other. Monke tries to keep Polina with him, but Choko comes to bring her home. Everyone has to make a choice and take their first big step in life.
title: New Wonder
